entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
